summary: In a time of political and social unrest in nineteenth-century Korea, an uncouth, self-taught painter explores his natural talent amidst the repressive world around him.
cast: Choi Min-sik|Sung-Ki Ahn|Ho-jeong Yu|Kim Yeo-Jin|Son Ye-jin|Jang-soo Bae|Tae-hee Kim|Jin-Seo Yoon
title: Ebrio de mujeres y pintura
